wizard.name: OSGi Declarative Services Component
wizard.description: Create an OSGi Declarative Services Component

wizard.name: Bnd Workspace (Fragments)
wizard.description: Create a new bnd/eclipse workspace using template fragments

command.name: Remove Resource
command.description: Remove selected resource from the repository

sourceContainerType.name: Bundle
sourceContainerType.description: Represents a resolved bundle from the current workspace

sourceContainerType.name: Bndrun Directive
sourceContainerType.description: Represents the bundles/jars listed under a particular directive in the bnd(run) file

sourceContainerType.name: Bndrun Execution Environment
sourceContainerType.description: Represents the jars for the VM that is/will be used to launch this bnd(run) file

description.description: Debug a JUnit Test in an OSGi Framework
Run an OSGi JUnit Test in an OSGi framework

template.name: Apache Felix 4 with Web Console and Gogo
Eclipse Equinox 3.7 with Gogo and DS

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the repository

property.name: tags
property.description: Comma separated list ('resolve' used for resolution. See -runrepos instruction for details. 'compile' for compilation. See -buildpath and -testpath for details). If any other tag like <<EMPTY>> is used, then this repo is excluded from resolution and compilation.

property.name: location
property.description: Local directory path

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the repository

property.name: tags
property.description: Comma separated list ('resolve' used for resolution. See -runrepos instruction for details. 'compile' for compilation. See -buildpath and -testpath for details). If any other tag like <<EMPTY>> is used, then this repo is excluded from resolution and compilation.

property.name: locations
property.description: Index locations (comma-separated list of URLs)

property.name: cache
property.description: Local cache for downloaded remote resources

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the repository

property.name: tags
property.description: Comma separated list ('resolve' used for resolution. See -runrepos instruction for details. 'compile' for compilation. See -buildpath and -testpath for details). If any other tag like <<EMPTY>> is used, then this repo is excluded from resolution and compilation.

property.name: local
property.description: Local directory path

property.name: phase
property.description: Resolution phase (build, runtime or any)

property.name: pretty
property.description: Enable pretty-printed index format

property.name: type
property.description: Index types, separated by '|'. E.g. 'R5|OBR'

property.name: disableServerVerify
property.description: Disable verification of server's X509 certificate (insecure, for testing only!)

property.name: configs
property.description: List of config files (comma-separated paths)

property.name: disableServerVerify
property.description: Disable verification of server's X509 certificate (insecure, for testing only!)

property.name: name
property.description: The name of this repository

property.name: tags
property.description: Comma separated list ('resolve' used for resolution. See -runrepos instruction for details. 'compile' for compilation. See -buildpath and -testpath for details). If any other tag like <<EMPTY>> is used, then this repo is excluded from resolution and compilation.

property.name: releaseUrl
property.description: The urls to the remote release repository.

property.name: stagingUrl
property.description: The url of the staging release repository.

property.name: snapshotUrl
property.description: The urls to the remote snapshot repository.

property.name: local
property.description: The path to the local repository

property.name: index
property.description: The path to the index file (relative to build.bnd, or an absolute path)

property.name: source
property.description: Content added to the index file. Content maybe one line without CR/LF as long as there is a comma or whitespace separating the GAVs. Further same format as the index file.

property.name: noupdateOnRelease
property.description: Do not update the index when a file is released

property.name: poll_time
property.description: Sets the time in seconds when to check for changes in the pom-files

property.name: redeploy
property.description: Allow redeploy

property.name: ignore_metainf_maven
property.description: Ignore maven information in META-INF/maven/....

property.name: multi
property.description: Extensions for files that contain multiple JARs

property.name: name
property.description: The name of this repository

property.name: tags
property.description: Comma separated list ('resolve' used for resolution. See -runrepos instruction for details. 'compile' for compilation. See -buildpath and -testpath for details). If any other tag like <<EMPTY>> is used, then this repo is excluded from resolution and compilation.

property.name: url
property.description: The URL to either the P2 repository (a directory) or an Eclipse target platform. Required.

property.name: location
property.description: The location to store the index file. Default: 'cnf/cache/p2-index-reponame/index.xml.gz'

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the repo. Required.

property.name: tags
property.description: Comma separated list ('resolve' used for resolution. See -runrepos instruction for details. 'compile' for compilation. See -buildpath and -testpath for details). If any other tag like <<EMPTY>> is used, then this repo is excluded from resolution and compilation.

property.name: releaseUrl
property.description: The url to the remote release repository. Can be a comma separated list of urls.

property.name: snapshotUrl
property.description: The url to the remote snapshot repository. If this is not specified, it falls back to the release repository or just local if this is also not specified. Can be a comma separated list of urls.

property.name: local
property.description: The path to the local repository

property.name: revision
property.description: Coordinates of a maven revision. I.e. group:artifactid[:c]:version. Can be a comma separated list of GAVs.

property.name: location
property.description: Points to a file that is used as the cache. It will be in OSGi format.

property.name: pom
property.description: Points to a pom.xml file. This is exclusive with revision. Can be a comma separated list of files. (relative to build.bnd, or an absolute path)

property.name: query
property.description: The query used to search Maven Central Search.

property.name: queryUrl
property.description: The url of the Maven Central Search.

property.name: transitive
property.description: Allow transitive dependencies

property.name: poll_time
property.description: Sets the time in seconds when to check for changes in the pom-files

property.name: dependencyManagement
property.description: Also considers the dependency management section of a POM. Default is false.

action.label: Generate bndrun...
action.tooltip: Generates a bndrun file corresponding to this launch file

action.label: Analyze bndrun...
action.tooltip: Analyzes a .bndrun file e.g. for unused bundles in repositories and other aspects.

filter.name: Hide Bnd Generated Jars
filter.description: Hide Java elements from bnd generated jars
